title: National Parks of New York Harbor: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Students of Rebecca Turner Elementary and Benjamin Turner Middle School in Mount Vernon, New York, lay carnations at Rebecca Turner's gravesite at St. Paul's Church National Historic Site. NPS PHOTO  Still Making History Today New York Harbor's 10 National Park Service sites made history in the past and still make the news today. New initiatives and events call attention to national parks and strengthen ties with members of the local communities near park sites. Look here for press releases and media advisories about these press opportunities.   If you wish to reach the press office of the National Parks of New York Harbor, call 212-825-2208 or e-mail us.
